description: Deletes an Amazon Q Business data source connector. While the data source is being deleted, the Status field returned by a call to the DescribeDataSource API is set to DELETING.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Q Business application used with the data source connector.

parameters.name: indexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index used with the data source connector.

parameters.name: dataSourceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the data source connector that you want to delete.
